VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.label: steel mining
VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.description: This settlement mines steel for their overlord.

VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.label: wood cutting
VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.description: This settlement chops wood for their overlord.

VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.description: This settlement pays gold to their overlord.

VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.description: This settlement pays silver to their overlord.

VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.label: farming
VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.description: This settlement produces survival meals for their overlord.

VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.label: honor tax
VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.description: This settlement provides honor to their overlord.

VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.label: slavery
VFEEmpire.TitheTypeDef.description: This settlement captures slaves for their overlord.
